protection-indicator-desc: An extension created solely for the purpose of adding protection indicators to pages.
protection-indicator-explanation-cascadi: This page is cascading $2 protected untill $3. '$1' rights are required to $2 this page.
This page is cascading $2 protected. '$1' rights are required to $2 this page.
protection-indicator-explanation-non-cas: This page is $2 protected untill $3. '$1' rights are required to $2 this page.
This page is $2 protected. '$1' rights are required to $2 this page.
